objc-assert-equals.description:
Description

Finds improper usages of
XCTAssertEqual
and
XCTAssertNotEqual
and replaces
them with
XCTAssertEqualObjects
or
XCTAssertNotEqualObjects
.

This makes tests less fragile, as many improperly rely on pointer equality for
strings that have equal values.  This assumption is not guaranteed by the
language.
objc-assert-equals.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
